tool_description: Calculates total material quantities needed including waste allowance, hardware, and finishing supplies for project completion.

cut_list_board_feet.description: Total board feet from cut list

project_complexity.description: Project complexity level: simple, moderate, or complex

hardware_needed.description: Types of hardware needed like screws, hinges, handles

finish_type.description: Finishing method: oil, polyurethane, lacquer, paint, or wax

error_messages: Invalid board feet: Must be a positive number
Invalid complexity level: Use simple, moderate, or complex
Invalid waste factor: Must be between 10 and 30 percent
Invalid finish type: Use oil, polyurethane, lacquer, paint, or wax
Negative quantities: All material quantities must be positive
usage: Input the board feet calculation and project complexity. Optionally specify waste factor, hardware needs, and finish type. The tool provides complete material quantities.

total_lumber_needed.description: Total board feet including waste allowance
